english.segment1: In joyous surrender. With our eyes fixed you. May our lives bring you glory. To serve you in all that we do
english.segment2: In joyous surrender. With our hearts full of praise. We sing of your mercy. We sing of your love and your grace
english.segment3: Father hear our song. A song of praise to the worthy one
english.segment4: In joyous surrender. With our eyes fixed on you. May our lives bring you glory to serve you in all that we do
english.segment5: Father hear our song. A song of praise to the worthy one. Father we have come. To offer our lives to the holy one
english.segment6: And we live for your glory and we live by your love. And we sing of your glory and we sing of your love. And we live for your glory and we live by your love. And we sing of your glory and we sing of your love
english.segment7: Father hear our song. A song of praise to the worthy one. Father we have come. To offer our lives to the holy one
english.segment8: And we live for your glory and we live by your love. And we sing of your glory and we sing of your love
